ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(RecordTypeId = "0129s0000004IoG") && ISPICKVAL(Case__r.Outlet_Activity__r.Activity__c, "47327") && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Service__c, "5") || ISPICKVAL(Service__c, "3") || ISPICKVAL(Service__c, "13") || ISPICKVAL(Service__c, "150") || ISPICKVAL(Service__c, "153") || ISPICKVAL(Service__c, "2") || ISPICKVAL(Service__c, "1") || ISPICKVAL(Service__c, "99") || ISPICKVAL(Service__c, "12") || ISPICKVAL(Service__c, "154") || ISPICKVAL(Service__c, "155"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This case has the Outlet Activity TEI Targeted Support. The Service must be: Counselling, Edu and Skills, Family Capacity, Indigenous Social or Support, Information/Advice/Referral, Intake/Assessment, Material Aid, Mentoring, Parenting, Playgroups.
